Property.Name: Location
Property.Comment: The location of the bottom-left corner of the image

Extents.Value: new DxfPoint(InsertionPoint.X + (Contents?.Length ?? 0) * TextHeight * 7.0 / 12.0, InsertionPoint.Y + TextHeight, InsertionPoint.Z)
new DxfPoint(Location.X + (Value?.Length ?? 0) * TextHeight * 7.0 / 12.0, Location.Y + TextHeight, Location.Z)
